ing: 1 (15 ounce) can sliced beets, drained and diced
1/2 cup creamy salad dressing, e.g. Miracle Whip â„¢
des: "This is an easy, quick, and wonderful vegetable salad dish that is so refreshing served ice cold.  My mother-in-law had it at every barbeque and if you don't like beets or peas, you will love this as it tastes like neither."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix together the peas, beets, onion and salad dressing. Refrigerate until cold, about 30 minutes, before serving.
